name: symengine

variants.name: boostmp
variants.description: Compile with Boost multi-precision integer library

variants.name: llvm
variants.description: Compile with LLVM JIT compiler support

variants.name: shared
variants.description: Enables the build of shared libraries

description: SymEngine is a fast symbolic manipulation library, written in C++.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: gmp
dependencies.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.

dependencies.name: llvm
dependencies.description:
The LLVM Project is a collection of modular and reusable compiler and
toolchain technologies. Despite its name, LLVM has little to do with
traditional virtual machines, though it does provide helpful libraries
that can be used to build them. The name "LLVM" itself is not an
acronym; it is the full name of the project.

dependencies.name: mpc
dependencies.description:
Gnu Mpc is a C library for the arithmetic of complex numbers with
arbitrarily high precision and correct rounding of the result.

dependencies.name: mpfr
dependencies.description:
The MPFR library is a C library for multiple-precision floating-point
computations with correct rounding.

dependencies.name: piranha
dependencies.description:
Piranha is a computer-algebra library for the symbolic manipulation of
sparse multivariate polynomials and other closely-related symbolic
objects (such as Poisson series).

dependent_to.name: dealii
dependent_to.description:
C++ software library providing well-documented tools to build finite
element codes for a broad variety of PDEs.

dependent_to.name: py-symengine
dependent_to.description: Python wrappers for SymEngine, a symbolic manipulation library.
